column5: Taking our first trip to Minnitaki the end of May.We are staying in the central part, on Butterfly Lake. Looking for suggestions on fishing spots this time of the year, also types of Live bait rigging. Thanks in advance.PS I hear there are Lake Trout in Minnitaki, ideas on where and how to catch a couple of those would be fun. (if the season is open) "Tight Lines to all"

Fished the west end for 4 years. Great fishing for walleyes, take lots of jigs, twister tails and leeches. Leave everything else at home. When your leeches are gone keep using the jigs. Fish up to 28 ''
